channel.title: Brace for Fail: A father in need
channel.description:
[img]https://img254.imageshack.us/img254/4554/afatherinneedpart1.jpg[/img]
Based on: [quote] [BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: Uh oh [DMC:S DEV] Triggs: UH OH? [BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: Car problem [DMC:S DEV] Triggs: Oh [DMC:S DEV] Triggs: Wait [DMC:S DEV] Triggs: Cars? [DMC:S DEV] Triggs: In Dragon Age? [DMC:S DEV] Triggs: AWESOME [BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: My dad is stuck at City Center T Junction [BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: battery died [BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: xD [DMC:S DEV] Triggs: SPLATTER THEM DRAGONS [BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: Must rescue father! [BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe flies [DMC:S DEV] Triggs hops in [BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: Meaning I have to take my car with jumper cables and waht not [DMC:S DEV] Triggs: Ya [BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: Brb [DMC:S DEV] Triggs: unless someone there has there own [DMC:S DEV] Triggs: and will help baconeggs: we could make a movie out of this [BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: Not where he's at [BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: It's 4PM [BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: everyone's lazy as fuck [BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: lol [/quote]

item.title: Brace for Fail: A father in need
item.dc:creator: Trigger_Proximity
item.description:
Because you touch yourself at night @_@
Or because you found it humorous
Either way that’s a good thing.
I think.

item.title: Brace for Fail: A father in need
item.dc:creator: Door
item.description:
You realised you did something wrong, though:

[TW] Door: The demoman looks awful in that frame >.<
Triggs | Travelling: Which frame
[TW] Door: 4
Triggs | Travelling: UH OH!
[TW] Door: 5…
[TW] Door: the head
[TW] Door: D:
Triggs | Travelling: That one?
[TW] Door: yea
[TW] Door: also it should be a question mark
Triggs | Travelling: Ah
Triggs | Travelling: Not really
[TW] Door: otherwise it looks like you’re saying uh oh to her saying uh oh
[TW] Door: Not asking
[TW] Door: like it was originally
Triggs | Travelling: It’s based on events in the chat
Triggs | Travelling: I didnt say UH OH?
Triggs | Travelling: I just screamed UH OH at her uh oh
[TW] Door: [DMC:S DEV] Triggs: UH OH?
[TW] Door: not
[TW] Door: [DMC:S DEV] Triggs: UH OH!
Triggs | Travelling: oh
Triggs | Travelling: Dear

Read full topic

item.title: Brace for Fail: A father in need
item.dc:creator: Door
item.description:
What? This?

b Collision.QP?[/b]: SMALL FONT IS SMALL
b Collision.QP?[/b]: NAMES
b Collision.QP?[/b]: EYESTRAIN
b Collision.QP?[/b]: -10 POINTS
b Collision.QP?[/b]: COULDN’T WAS SPELT WITHOUT AN APPOSROPHE
b Collision.QP?[/b]: -20 POINTS
b Collision.QP?[/b]: DEMOMAN LOOKS LIKE HE IS ABOUT TO CHOKE ON A DICK
b Collision.QP?[/b]: OR
b Collision.QP?[/b]: SNEASE
b Collision.QP?[/b]: -5 POINTS FOR BAD POSING
b Collision.QP?[/b]: CAR RANDOMLY FLIES INTO THE AIR
b Collision.QP?[/b]: -5 POINTS FOR INCONSISTENCY
b Collision.QP?[/b]: TRIGGS
b Collision.QP?[/b]: for something that took that long
b Collision.QP?[/b]: faaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaail
b Collision.QP?[/b]: a grand total finish of -30 points

It should be -40 points, not -30. lern2basicmathematics

Read full topic

[DMC:S DEV] Triggs: Wait

[DMC:S DEV] Triggs: AWESOME
[BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: My dad is stuck at City Center T Junction
[BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: battery died
[BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: xD
[DMC:S DEV] Triggs: SPLATTER THEM DRAGONS
[BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: Must rescue father!
[BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe flies
[DMC:S DEV] Triggs hops in
[BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: Meaning I have to take my car with jumper cables and waht not
[DMC:S DEV] Triggs: Ya
[BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: Brb
[DMC:S DEV] Triggs: unless someone there has there own
[DMC:S DEV] Triggs: and will help
baconeggs: we could make a movie out of this
[BMS IT Tech] DarkBabe: Not where he’s at
